author: By Reade Pickert, Bloomberg News
title: Worst-case fears of 20%-plus US jobless rate are now realistic
description: What started as the worst-case scenario for U.S. unemployment is quickly becoming reality. Some economists now see the jobless rate surging to 20% as soon as this month - and there's no guarantee it would stop there. About 5.5 million…
content:
Pennsylvania Figures
One possible bright spot in the data: Pennsylvania, which initially saw outsize weekly figures compared with other states, has begun to show a slower pace of claims, offering hope that other states may follow.
